name: NINJA LOG'S HOURS RUN!
description: NINJA LOG needs to log his hours!  Get to your OHDELA computer at the end of each stage to log them!  Avoid the WASTED TIME, F's, and LAZY HOURS.  Hit one of them and it's a LOG JAM!   Get through 10 stages to obtain 5 hours and win the day!  Hit the UP arrow to jump.  While in the air hit UP again to do a double jump.  Hit the down arrow to slide.  WATCH OUT though!  The WASTE BINS cannot be destroyed.
